content.en: Rock image analysis: Machine learning algorithms, such as convolutional neural networks, can be used to predict geologic and petrophysical properties from images of rocks. These algorithms can identify patterns, reduce analysis time, and minimize bias and inconsistencies. They can also automate tasks like lithofacies identification, carbonate petrography, ichnological analysis, and lithological classification, providing faster and more efficient solutions for geoscientists. Additionally, deep learning techniques can address geological challenges in mineral resource estimation and classify mineral thin sections and other geo-data accurately and quickly.
content.da: Billedanalyse af sten: Maskinlæringsalgoritmer, såsom konvolutionelle neurale netværk, kan bruges til at forudsige geologiske og petrofysiske egenskaber ud fra billeder af sten. Disse algoritmer kan identificere mønstre, reducere analysetiden og minimere bias og inkonsekvenser. De kan også automatisere opgaver som lithofacies-identifikation, karbonatpetrografi, ichnologisk analyse og lithologisk klassifikation, hvilket giver hurtigere og mere effektive løsninger for geovidenskabsmænd. Derudover kan dyb læringsteknikker tackle geologiske udfordringer inden for minerale ressourceestimering og klassificering af mineraltyndsnit og andre geo-data præcist og hurtigt.
